root.name: Christmas Lemmings 1994
root.description: OverviewChristmas Lemmings 1994 is computer game based upon the original Lemmings game released in 1991. The game was developed by DMA Design (now Rockstar North) and published by Psygnosis and was also released under the name Holiday Lemmings 1994.The gameplay remains exactly the same as the original Lemmings game, requiring the player to lead the required number of lemmings to the exit by assigning skills which help them navigate the level.Christmas Lemmings differs from the original in that it contains levels with Christmas/snow-styled graphics, and the lemmings wear Santa Claus suits.Other Christmas themed Lemmings games were published by Psygnosis in 1991, 1992, and 1993. The versions from 1991 and 1992 were only 4 level demos. Christmas Lemmings 1994 contains 32 new levels plus the 32 levels from Christmas Lemmings 1993.

similar_games.game: Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Mini-Land Mayhem
